Finite Volume Method for Nonlinear Nonlocal Equations¶

Overview¶

This MATLAB project explores the following system:

\[\partial_t\rho_i = \nabla\cdot[\rho_i\nabla(H'(\rho_i)+V(x)+W\ast\rho_i)]\]

where \(\rho_i\) describes a probability measure of one species in the system

implements the finite volume scheme described in this paper, and extending the scheme to include more than one species.

System Requirements

Software Requires MATLAB Release Compatibility
MATLAB Created with R2018a

Links¶

  • Source Code: Github
  • A Finite-Volume Method for Nonlinear Nonlocal Equations with a Gradient Flow Structure: arXiv:1402.4252v2
